0: origin 1

[1, 2, 3, 4]=>0,

27: 2-swap: 4 choose 2 = 6

[1, 2, 4, 3]=>26.985235904912454,
[1, 3, 2, 4]=>26.985235904912454,

[3, 2, 1, 4]=>26.985235904912454,
[4, 2, 3, 1]=>26.985235904912457,


28.5: 3-cycle: (4 choose 3) * 2 = 8
[1, 3, 4, 2]=>28.484375784616855,
